segments.text: As I stand by, I can’t help but feel a mix of emotions swirling inside me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s focus on drying that plate almost feels like denial of the chaos that surrounds her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the puddle grow, spreading across the floor with relentless determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s daring climb to the cookie jar fascinates me, but it terrifies me at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hopeful expression, with her arm stretched upward, makes my heart swell with affection.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, there’s a trace of disgust laced in the excitement; they’re breaking a rule right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside, with its tidy path and low bushes, feels like a world away from this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
